str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Hair (of the head or of animals). Genitive case trichos, etc. of uncertain derivation; hair.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
